input.sentences: so many great snow sculptures this year at the annual snow sculpture competition . there was a fish face .
the funniest one was the giant toilet .
the winning sculpture though created an entire scene .
output.sentences: Winter came to the sleepy little midwestern town and it was time again for the Annual Snow Sculpture Competition.
The McGill family two houses down the road made a fat and happy T-Rex with the tiniest little hands.
The local plumbers union put together a giant snow toilet to remind everyone of their contribution to the town.
A couple college students that were visiting for the holidays decided to represent their fraternity but it was really lack luster compared to the winning entry.
This year the Golden Snow Globe award went to Sally Smackypants, the local librarian, and her diorama of the school library.
